channel.title: Stranger Foods
channel.description: A catalogue of recipes Tom has made.

item.title: Balsamic chicken with creamy mash
item.description:
Balsamic chicken with creamy mash



This balsamic sauce is rich and so yummy. Gluten-free: make sure the stock cubes are gluten-free..

item.title: Cashew nut chicken
item.description:
Cashew nut chicken



Gluten-free: make sure the stock cubes are gluten-free..

item.title: Chicken and mushrooms curry with coconut milk
item.description:
Chicken and mushrooms curry with coconut milk



This is super quick for a curry. Perfect for when you get in from work and need food on the table pronto. Gluten-free: use gluten-free plain flour in the sauce and gluten-free naan bread..

item.title: Chicken in black bean sauce
item.description:
Chicken in black bean sauce



Gluten-free: make sure the stock cube, soy and black bean sauce are gluten-free..

item.title: Chorizo & chilli rigatoni
item.description:
Chorizo & chilli rigatoni



Chorizo has a hearty flavour which infuses pasta dishes well. Gluten-free: make sure the chorizo and pasta are gluten-free..

item.title: Cider pork & bacon pie with cauliflower and potato mash
item.description:
Cider pork & bacon pie with cauliflower and potato mash



This is a good, everyday pie, using pork mince, which is slightly less expensive than lamb or beef. Gluten-free: use gluten-free plain flour in the sauce..
